text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the DELL Alienware 17 R5 AW17R5-7472SLV 17.3" 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Apex Legends. The build quality of the DELL Alienware 17 R5 AW17R5-7472SLV 17.3" 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
